raw.title: [BIP-645] Enable Gauge for inETH/wstETH [Arbitrum]
raw.author: 0x7019Be4E4eB74cA5F61224FeAf687d2b43998516
raw.body:
PR with Payload
https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/1108

**Summary:**
> This is a proposal on behalf of InceptionLRT to enable a gauge for inETH/wstETH on Arbitrum. inETH is the Restaking Token dedicated to ETH, obtained through InceptionLRT’s restaking mechanism and platform.
InceptionLRT is an omnichain liquid restaking protocol offering both Native and Isolated restaking to users. 

**References/Useful links:**

> Link to:
    • Website: https://www.inceptionlrt.com/
    • Documentation: https://docs.inceptionlrt.com/
    • Github Page: https://github.com/inceptionlrt/smart-contracts/tree/master
    • Communities: https://twitter.com/InceptionLRT, Discord: [InceptionLRT](https://discord.com/invite/gBswunawAn)

**Protocol Description:**

> InceptionLRT is an omnichain liquid restaking protocol offering both Native and Isolated restaking to users. 
Powered by the Flash Unstake mechanism and supported by node operators with DVT Technology, InceptionLRT aims to become the most complete liquid restaking protocol in DeFi. The isolated architecture combined with the flash unstake feature solves the only drawback of isolated LRTs - liquidity fragmentation! 

**Motivation:**

> InceptionLRT aims to enable a gauge for inETH/wstETH to substantially increase the liquidity of inETH, while supporting its utility and viability for integration into a range of DeFi protocols.

**Specifications:**
 
1. **Governance:** ING holders participate in decision-making, influencing the protocol’s direction and policies, including the Node Operators, AVSs and restaking strategies.
Incentive Allocation: Through gauge weight voting, veING holders direct incentives and rewards towards preferred liquidity, impacting the protocol’s dynamics.
Rewards and Participation: Providing ING to liquidity pools like the 80-20 Balancer Liquidity Pools and locking the LP token earns veING, granting access to various protocol.   

2. **Oracles:** Rate Provider for [inETH](https://etherscan.io/address/0x971b35225361535d04828f16442aaa54009efe1a). 

3. **Audits:** InceptionLRT undergoes security audits and checks to ensure the safety of user funds. Latest: https://docs.inceptionlrt.com/security/audit-reports.

4. **Centralization vectors:** The InceptionLRT Litepaper introduced the vision for Inception as a decentralized system where independent node operators work to power the growth and development of Web3. Further detailed information may be found here: [EigenLayer - Inception iLRTs Docs](https://docs.inceptionlrt.com/introduction/eigenlayer#the-decentralization-factor-on-eigen-layer).

5. **Market History:** No major volatility - [CoinGecko](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/inception-restaked-eth).
 
6. **Value:** The pool is intended to be the primary source of liquidity for inETH on Arbitrum and allow for a healthy stimulation of volume.

Pool: https://app.balancer.fi/#/arbitrum/pool/0xb8cb384e65096386c1edaaf784e842c957fa3645000000000000000000000571
Child Chain Gauge: https://arbiscan.io/address/0x2dEafe52b0bCb9801d3aaDc0D75c7879cB2E5825
Root Gauge: https://etherscan.io/address/0xE3A23a49128Aa55d0705E4F97ac4dc3149dFf729

### Technical Specifications:

Transaction: The Balancer Maxi LM Multisig eth:`0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860` will interact with the GaugeAdderv4 at `0x5DbAd78818D4c8958EfF2d5b95b28385A22113Cd` and call the addGauge function with the following arguments:

gauge(address): `0xE3A23a49128Aa55d0705E4F97ac4dc3149dFf729`

gaugeType(string): `Arbitrum`

choices: No, this is not the way

> This is a proposal on behalf of InceptionLRT to enable a gauge for instETH/wstETH on Arbitrum. instETH is the Restaking Token dedicated to stETH, obtained through InceptionLRT’s restaking mechanism and platform.

**Protocol Description:**

> InceptionLRT is an omnichain liquid restaking protocol offering both Native and Isolated restaking to users.
Powered by the Flash Unstake mechanism and supported by node operators with DVT Technology, InceptionLRT aims to become the most complete liquid restaking protocol in DeFi. The isolated architecture combined with the flash unstake feature solves the only drawback of isolated LRTs - liquidity fragmentation!

**Motivation:**

> InceptionLRT aims to enable a gauge for instETH/wstETH to substantially increase the liquidity of instETH, while supporting its utility and viability for integration into a range of DeFi protocols.

**Specifications:**
 
1. **Governance:** ING holders participate in decision-making, influencing the protocol’s direction and policies, including the Node Operators, AVSs and restaking strategies.
Incentive Allocation: Through gauge weight voting, veING holders direct incentives and rewards towards preferred liquidity, impacting the protocol’s dynamics.
Rewards and Participation: Providing ING to liquidity pools like the 80-20 Balancer Liquidity Pools and locking the LP token earns veING, granting access to various protocol.

Child Chain Gauge: [Vyper_contract | Address 0x2dEafe52b0bCb9801d3aaDc0D75c7879cB2E5825 | Arbiscan](https://arbiscan.io/address/0xb072496eEf1F88a2Bd1BA93F880c7ed685264EB1)
Root Gauge: [ArbitrumRootGauge | Address 0xE3A23a49128Aa55d0705E4F97ac4dc3149dFf729 | Etherscan](https://etherscan.io/address/0x82bc385C57447188de50Ba8237210cAaA43a0BB3)

### Technical Specifications:

gauge(address): `0x82bc385C57447188de50Ba8237210cAaA43a0BB3`

raw.title: [BIP-549] Enable Gauge for instETH/wstETH [Ethereum]
raw.author: 0x9f74662aD05840Ba35d111930501c617920dD68e
raw.body:
### PR with Payload

https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/811

**Summary:**
> This is a proposal on behalf of InceptionLRT to enable a gauge for instETH/wstETH on Ethereum. instETH is the Restaked Token dedicated to stETH, obtained through InceptionLRT's restaking mechanism and platform. 
InceptionLRT is an isolated Liquid Restaking protocol for Liquid Staking Tokens (LSTs), enabling the restaking of various LSTs with the initial focus on stETH and rETH. Its core feature is the issuance of Isolated Liquid Restaking Tokens (iLRTs) for each restaked LST. 

**References/Useful links:**

> Link to:
    • Website: https://www.inceptionlrt.com/
    • Documentation: https://docs.inceptionlrt.com/
    • Github Page: https://github.com/inceptionlrt/smart-contracts/tree/master
    • Communities: https://twitter.com/InceptionLRT, Discord: https://discord.com/invite/gBswunawAn

**Protocol Description:**

> InceptionLRT is an isolated Liquid Restaking protocol for Liquid Staking Tokens (LSTs), enabling the restaking of various LSTs with the initial focus on stETH and rETH. Its core feature is the issuance of Isolated Liquid Restaking Tokens (iLRTs) for each restaked LST. 
These iLRTs can be freely traded and used in other DeFi protocols while maintaining segregation from the underlying LSTs. This architecture addresses potential risks associated with basket-based LRTs like increased complexity, counterparty risk, and often unclear pool rebalancing rules.
InceptionLRT is specifically designed to bolster the EigenLayer framework by addressing a critical challenge: the issue of liquidity locking in the protocol. This advancement positions InceptionLRT as a key player in enhancing the fluidity and accessibility of restaking in the DeFi landscape.


**Motivation:**

> InceptionLRT aims to enable a gauge for instETH/wstETH to substantially increase the liquidity of instETH, while supporting its utility and viability for integration into a range of DeFi protocols.

**Specifications:**
 
>1. **Governance:** ING holders participate in decision-making, influencing the protocol’s direction and policies, including the Node Operators, AVSs and restaking strategies.
Incentive Allocation: Through gauge weight voting, veING holders direct incentives and rewards towards preferred liquidity, impacting the protocol's dynamics.
Rewards and Participation: Providing ING to liquidity pools like the 80-20 Balancer Liquidity Pools and locking the LP token earns veING, granting access to various protocol.
>2. **Oracles:** Rate Provider for [instETH](https://etherscan.io/address/0x343281bb5029c4b698fe736d800115ac64d5de39#readContract).
>3. **Audits:** InceptionLRT undergoes security audits and checks to ensure the safety of user funds. Latest by Veridise: [Audit](https://549839982-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2FH5cQR703CA1JD1dlB1kD%2Fuploads%2Fnb7LLR0qt6qsNbvhex8f%2Fveridise-inceptionlrt-12-jan-2024.pdf?alt=media&token=d08d44bc-6bc6-409a-886b-294599a96e12)
>4. **Centralization vectors:** The InceptionLRT Litepaper introduced the vision for Inception as a decentralized system where independent node operators work to power the growth and development of Web3. Further detailed information may be found here: https://docs.inceptionlrt.com/introduction/eigenlayer#the-decentralization-factor-on-eigen-layer.
>5. **Market History:** No major volatility - [CoinGecko](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/inception-restaked-steth).
 >6. **Value:**  The pool is intended to be the primary source of liquidity for instETH on Ethereum and allow for a healthy stimulation of volume.

Pool: [0xe3e0022d25194431a98e8bf5034d2617c96e1d44](https://app.balancer.fi/#/ethereum/pool/0xe3e0022d25194431a98e8bf5034d2617c96e1d44000000000000000000000670) 
Gauge: [0xCDA1B6704B108dF230d2a36da4C088C6afd6f335](https://etherscan.io/address/0xCDA1B6704B108dF230d2a36da4C088C6afd6f335)

Transaction: The Balancer Maxi LM Multisig `eth:0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860` will interact with the GaugeAdderv4 at `0x5DbAd78818D4c8958EfF2d5b95b28385A22113Cd` and call the `addGauge` function with the following arguments:

gauge(address): `0xCDA1B6704B108dF230d2a36da4C088C6afd6f335`

gaugeType(string): `Ethereum`

choices: No, this is not the way

raw.title: [BIP-605] Enable Gauge for inankrETH/ankrETH [Ethereum]
raw.author: 0x7c2eA10D3e5922ba3bBBafa39Dc0677353D2AF17
raw.body:
Payload with PR

https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/959

Summary:

This is a proposal on behalf of InceptionLRT to enable a gauge for inankrETH/ankrETH on Ethereum. inankrETH is the Restaked Token dedicated to ankrETH, obtained through InceptionLRT’s restaking mechanism and platform.
InceptionLRT is an isolated Liquid Restaking protocol for Liquid Staking Tokens (LSTs), enabling the restaking of various LSTs. Its core feature is the issuance of Isolated Liquid Restaking Tokens (iLRTs) for each restaked LST.

References/Useful links:

Link to:
• Website: https://www.inceptionlrt.com/ 1
• Documentation: https://docs.inceptionlrt.com/
• Github Page: GitHub - inceptionlrt/smart-contracts: Smart contracts, vaults, tokens, and associated tests for the InceptionLRT project
• Communities: https://twitter.com/InceptionLRT, Discord: InceptionLRT

Protocol Description:

InceptionLRT is an isolated Liquid Restaking protocol for Liquid Staking Tokens (LSTs), enabling the restaking of various LSTs. Its core feature is the issuance of Isolated Liquid Restaking Tokens (iLRTs) for each restaked LST.
These iLRTs can be freely traded and used in other DeFi protocols while maintaining segregation from the underlying LSTs. This architecture addresses potential risks associated with basket-based LRTs like increased complexity, counterparty risk, and often unclear pool rebalancing rules.
InceptionLRT is specifically designed to bolster the EigenLayer framework by addressing a critical challenge: the issue of liquidity locking in the protocol. This advancement positions InceptionLRT as a key player in enhancing the fluidity and accessibility of restaking in the DeFi landscape.

Motivation:

InceptionLRT aims to enable a gauge for inankrETH/ankrETH to substantially increase the liquidity of inankrETH, while supporting its utility and viability for integration into a range of DeFi protocols.

Specifications:

Governance: ING holders participate in decision-making, influencing the protocol’s direction and policies, including the Node Operators, AVSs and restaking strategies.
Incentive Allocation: Through gauge weight voting, veING holders direct incentives and rewards towards preferred liquidity, impacting the protocol’s dynamics.
Rewards and Participation: Providing ING to liquidity pools like the 80-20 Balancer Liquidity Pools and locking the LP token earns veING, granting access to various protocol.

Oracles: Rate Provider for inankrETH 1. Rate provider review deemed SAFE.

Audits: InceptionLRT undergoes security audits and checks to ensure the safety of user funds. Latest by Veridise: Audit

Centralization vectors: The InceptionLRT Litepaper introduced the vision for Inception as a decentralized system where independent node operators work to power the growth and development of Web3. Further detailed information may be found here: EigenLayer - Inception iLRTs Docs.

Market History: No major volatility - CoinGecko.

Value: The pool is intended to be the primary source of liquidity for inankrETH on Ethereum and allow for a healthy stimulation of volume.

Pool: Balancer

Gauge: Vyper_contract | Address 0xCC9723faDed81a9448a9664c39C0Df2e77FDfA2E | Etherscan

Specification:
The Balancer Maxi LM Multisig eth:0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860 will interact with the GaugeAdderv4 at 0x5DbAd78818D4c8958EfF2d5b95b28385A22113Cd and call the addGauge function with the following arguments:

gauge(address): 0xCC9723faDed81a9448a9664c39C0Df2e77FDfA2E
gaugeType(string): Ethereum

choices: No, this is not the way

raw.title: [BIP-639] Enable Gauge for weETH/wstETH on Optimism
raw.author: 0x7019Be4E4eB74cA5F61224FeAf687d2b43998516
raw.body:
### PR with Payload
https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/1100

**Summary:**

This is a proposal to enable uncapped Balancer gauge for weETH/wstETH pool on Optimism and grant core pool status.

**References/Useful links:**

• Website https://www.ether.fi/

• Documentation [ether.fi Whitepaper | ether.fi](https://etherfi.gitbook.io/etherfi/ether.fi-whitepaper)

• Github Page [etherfi-protocol · GitHub](https://github.com/etherfi-protocol)

• Twitter https://twitter.com/ether_fi

**Protocol Description:**

Ether.fi is a decentralized, non-custodial liquid staking protocol built on Ethereum, allowing users to stake their ETH and participate in the DeFi ecosystem without losing liquidity. The protocol’s eETH is a liquid restaking token (weETH is the non-rebasing equivalent), serving as a representation of ETH staked on the Beacon Chain, which rebases daily to reflect the associated staking rewards. Users can deposit ETH into the liquidity pool on Ethereum Mainnet to mint eETH, hold eETH to accrue rewards, and use eETH within DeFi or swap it back to ETH at any time via the liquidity pool. The protocol currently employs a permissioned validator set, however this will transition to permissionless based on the protocol’s roadmap.

ETH staked through the ether.fi liquidity pool accrues normal Ethereum staking rewards, and will also be natively restaked with EigenLayer. Staking with eETH on ether.fi automatically natively restakes that ETH to EigenLayer and accrues normal staking rewards while allowing users to keep composability on their eETH in other DeFi protocols.

stETH is a rebase token by Lido that also represents staked ether but instead of the exchange rate accumulation method, the staking rewards are given as extra stETH. Effectively, stETH always stays pegged 1:1 with ETH and stETH token balances are updated when the oracle reports the change in the total (initial deposit + staking rewards) every day. wstETH is the wrapped version of regular stETH which allows for stETH accumulation in the contract and turns the rebase model of stETH into the C-token model of other LSTs.

**Motivation:**

Develop additional liquidity for weETH on Optimism

**Specifications:**

1. **Governance:** Currently, the protocol utilizes a multi signature wallet, with the signatories being doxxed[ ether.fi](http://ether.fi/) executives. This will change with the evolution of the protocol, moving to decentralized governance with a DAO and a governance token.

2. **Oracles:**

[weETH rate provider](https://optimistic.etherscan.io/address/0xef42D000a3e85C4e71C57e2C6A1E600e86f5a91B)

[wstETH rate provider](https://optimistic.etherscan.io/address/0xef42D000a3e85C4e71C57e2C6A1E600e86f5a91B)

3. **Audits:**

Audit reports for the [ether.fi](http://ether.fi/) protocol are found on the [GitBook page](https://etherfi.gitbook.io/etherfi/security/audits). The audits have been carried out by reputable firms such as Certik, Zellic, Nethermind, Omniscia and Solidified to ensure the security of the protocol.

4. **Centralization vectors:**

The centralization vectors primarily relate to the Oracle until it becomes decentralized, in line with the protocol roadmap. The price (staking rewards for rebasing) and the validator management (spinning up new validators and exiting them for liquidation) are also currently centralized for the early stages of the protocol to ensure mobility. As mentioned above, the signatories currently consist of the doxxed executive team at [ether.fi](http://ether.fi/), however this will be upgraded with the implementation of the [ether.fi](http://ether.fi/) DAO and governance.

5. **Market History:**

eETH was first deployed November 15, 2023. Market history and protocol information can be found here on the [Dune dashboard](https://dune.com/ether_fi/etherfi)

6. **Value:**

The weETH/wstETH pool is intended to grow into a major liquidity source for weETH or Optimism. Pairing with wstETH will give the pool good routing and ought to provide high protocol fees.

**Contracts:**

[weETH contract](https://optimistic.etherscan.io/address/0x5A7fACB970D094B6C7FF1df0eA68D99E6e73CBFF)

[weETH rate provider](https://optimistic.etherscan.io/address/0xef42D000a3e85C4e71C57e2C6A1E600e86f5a91B)

[wstETH contract](https://optimistic.etherscan.io/address/0x1f32b1c2345538c0c6f582fcb022739c4a194ebb)

[wstETH rate provider](https://optimistic.etherscan.io/address/0x9aa3cd420f830E049e2b223D0b07D8c809C94d15)

[Pool link](https://op.beets.fi/pool/0x2bb4712247d5f451063b5e4f6948abdfb925d93d000000000000000000000136)

[Pool contract](https://optimistic.etherscan.io/address/0x2bb4712247d5f451063b5e4f6948abdfb925d93d)

[Child gauge on Optimism](https://optimistic.etherscan.io/address/0xF3B314B1D2bd7d9afa8eC637716A9Bb81dBc79e5)

[Root gauge on Ethereum](https://etherscan.io/address/0x3Db8e1Ffe58EA99939efaeF084ca23Cc0195B531)

**Specification:**

The Balancer Maxi LM Multisig `eth:0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860` will interact with the GaugeAdderv4 at `0x5DbAd78818D4c8958EfF2d5b95b28385A22113Cd `and call the addGauge function with the following arguments:
gauge(address): `0x3Db8e1Ffe58EA99939efaeF084ca23Cc0195B531`
gaugeType(string): `Optimism`

choices: No, this is not the way

decision.summary: The proposal to enable a gauge for instETH/wstETH on Optimism is supported unanimously in the timeline and positively discussed in the forum, aiming to increase liquidity and volume.
key_arguments_for: Unanimous voting lead and high stability for 'Yes, let's do it' option in timeline analysis.
Forum discussion is positive with detailed support for the proposal's benefits and protocol description.
Market impacts during the event window show positive price (+1.45%) and TVL (+3.32%) changes.
The proposal will substantially increase liquidity of instETH on Optimism, a strategic improvement.
key_arguments_against: Similar past proposals with a 'Yes, let's do it' stance experienced post-vote price and TVL declines, indicating risk of negative market reaction.

evidence.quote: Positive forum sentiment with detailed proposal description and benefits; first comment fully supports enabling the gauge.
Timeline metrics show 100% lead ratio and stability for 'Yes, let's do it' option across all quartiles.
Similar past proposals with 'Yes, let's do it' stance showed declines in token price and TVL post-vote, indicating some risk.

available_choices: No, this is not the way
decision.ai_final_conclusion: Option 'Yes, let's do it' selected with stance to keep 'Change'.
decision.ai_final_reason:
- Timeline voting data shows unanimous and stable support for enabling the gauge.
- Forum sentiment is positive and supportive, reflecting community alignment with the recommendation.
- Market data during the event window indicates positive price and TVL movements, supporting the proposal's benefits.
- Although similar past proposals saw negative market reactions, the current context and sentiment suggest this change is beneficial and aligned with organizational long-term health.
